item.description:
4/4/13  Change in location, we are now going to

Holiday Stadium 10 in Wallingford.

.....................................................................

I will be coming from Dunkin Donuts in Hamden

right to the movie.

If any of the rest of you want to meet before the movie

then you can plan that among yourselves.

A)

A parasitic alien soul is injected into the body of Melanie Stryder. Instead of carrying out her race's mission of taking over the Earth, "Wanda" (as she comes to be called) forms a bond with her host and sets out to aid other free humans.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1517260/

www.imdb.com/title/tt1517260/

 

B)

http://thehostthefilm.com/

thehostthefilm.com/

C)

This is a 45 minute Google Q & A with Stephanie Meyer and

members of the cast.  This is probably the best way to learn

what the movie is about and what the cast members are like.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-TJzhPlyRs

www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-TJzhPlyRs

 

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.
